long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🙄 Tired of Switching Tabs?
Fed up with hopping between ChatGPT to fix grammar and Google Translate to translate text? Say goodbye to the hassle and meet TextWise—your ultimate AI writing assistant!

With TextWise, everything you need to polish, rewrite, or translate is just a click away, making your writing process smooth and seamless.

Why TextWise?
Imagine writing an email and spotting a grammar mistake. Instead of switching tabs, TextWise fixes it instantly. Need a quick translation? Done in seconds. Your personal writing assistant is always ready, right within your browser.

Key Features:
✨ Grammar Fix: Instantly polish your writing for a professional touch.

🔄 Rewriting: Easily rephrase sentences to improve clarity and style.

🌐 Quick Translation: Translate to multiple languages in a snap.

⚡ One-Click & Shortcuts: Access all features instantly with one click or a shortcut.

📄 Works Everywhere: Seamlessly supports emails, social media, documents, and more!


📝 Perfect For: Students, professionals, writers—anyone ready to take their writing to the next level!

🚀 Why Wait? Try TextWise Today!
Transform your writing experience and stay in the flow with every word. Get TextWise now!
